transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir Aashutosh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Nahi nahi aapki aawaz bahut kat rahi hai.
Executive: Aashutosh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Sir abhi aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan nahi nahi mere paas aapka number toh hai saved but aapki aawaz thodi si kat ke aa rahi thi aisa lag raha hai.
Executive: Abhi proper aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan haan ab better hai. Main ye bol raha tha sir domain aapne purchase kar liya?
Customer: Nahi abhi nahi kiya hai. Aaj mere paas actually dusre kaam the haath ke.
Executive: Ji. But main ye bol raha tha sir ki ye jo cheez hai na ye aapke end se hi keval possible hai. Maine discuss kari thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Domain aap purchase karke hame share kar sakte ho. Theek hai? Not a big deal.
Customer: Okay. Like ki humne already aapka domain liya.
Executive: Theek hai. Aapko uska hi access mil jaega. Par aapke paas access nahi hai toh access hum provide karwa denge.
Customer: Haan na access aap provide karwa dijiyega. Ye wala iska domain domain main purchase karke aapko kaise share karunga wo thoda sa aapko shayad mujhe guide karna padega but wo nahi hai. Main aapko ek kaam karta hu ye whatsapp number hai sir aapka 89 wala?
Executive: Haan ye whatsapp haan yahi whatsapp number hai. Main aapko whatsapp apna mail id share kar dunga. Simply aapko kuch nahi karna. Aap jaise hi access le loge toh id and password aap mere ko share kar dena. Hum access karwa denge. Same aap karwa denge website pe. Theek hai? Usme koi dikkat pareshani aapko nahi aayegi.
Customer: Simply sir aapka ek ticket khula tha iske regarding. Toh wo main close kar deta hu main. Jab aap domain purchase kar lo mail kar dena simply wo cheeze ho jayengi update automatic. Aap usko kya hua aapka wo matlab wo progress uske saath tha basically haan. Wo usse koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Samajh gaya main samajh gaya. Wo ticket main close karwa deta hu.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai okay. Aapke paas ek whatsapp pe message aayega sir basically. Are you satisfied yes or no aap wo kar dena.
Executive: Haan theek hai na. Baki apan ye wala coordinate karte hai I think ek do din mein wo aap. Main aapko simply whatsapp kar deta hu. Abhi apna mail id whatsapp kar do toh aap mere ko simply us pe reward kar dena. Baki main aage forward kar dunga.
Customer: Okay okay okay okay okay. Thank you haan. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's voice was breaking.

- How to share domain after purchasing.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the customer's WhatsApp number.

- Executive will share mail ID on WhatsApp.

- Executive will close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share ID and password after access.

- Customer to reply to satisfaction message on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- domain, whatsapp, mail id, ticket
